geoget_ladsweb[source]

geoget_ladsweb(product:<fastscript.core.Param object at 0x7f5cac5973d0>, collection:<fastscript.core.Param object at 0x7f5cac597580>, tstart:<fastscript.core.Param object at 0x7f5c54a5f670>, tend:<fastscript.core.Param object at 0x7f5c54a5f5e0>, bbox:<fastscript.core.Param object at 0x7f5c5455d700>, path_save:<fastscript.core.Param object at 0x7f5c5455d790>, bands:<fastscript.core.Param object at 0x7f5c54a4f8b0>, coordsOrTiles:<fastscript.core.Param object at 0x7f5c54a4f910>='coords', daynight:<fastscript.core.Param object at 0x7f5c534aa8e0>='DNB', repName:<fastscript.core.Param object at 0x7f5c534aa8b0>='GEO', repPixSize:<fastscript.core.Param object at 0x7f5c5070ba90>=0.01, repResample:<fastscript.core.Param object at 0x7f5c5109fee0>='bilinear', doMosaic:<fastscript.core.Param object at 0x7f5c4ccc22e0>='False')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Here is an example of a .bash file to download data using geoget_ladsweb. The email and authentication token (auth) need to be defined in order for the script to work. To create an account and an authentication token visit https://ladsweb.modaps.eosdis.nasa.gov/.

#!/bin/bash -l 
bbox='-10 36 0 44'
product="NPP_VMAES_L1"
collection="5000"
tstart="2017-10-27 00:00:00"
tend='2017-10-27 23:59:59'
path_save="/srv/geoget/data"
bands="Reflectance_M5 Reflectance_M7 Reflectance_M10 Radiance_M12 Radiance_M15 SolarZenithAngle SatelliteZenithAngle"

geoget_ladsweb $product $collection "$tstart" "$tend" "$bbox" $path_save "$bands" --repName "GEO" --repPixSize "0.01" --daynight "D"
{% raw %}

#!/bin/bash -l 
path_save="/srv/geoget/data"
geoget_ladsweb $path_save
